page.title: 03A Day in my Life.... By Zoe
page.content: My alarm begins to ring at a quarter to seven precisely. I stroll into the bathroom, get washed, dressed, and clean my teeth. I tramp downstairs. I put some bread in the toaster and make some tea. I wave goodbye to my mum and set off along the road to school. In school we sit down and read. Next we have a maths lesson. Bell rings for break, and rings again for more lessons. After last break I go for a violin lesson. I go home and have tea. I then go out with my friends. I have my supper and watch television. I trudge up the winding stairs, clean my teeth and go into my lovely warm bed.
